body: High school relationship, they’d probably break up. I like ntr, but shit like this is dumb cause it’s badly written, and has an unsatisfying resolution. Two chapters to tell a story and develop an arc but resolved without any proper payoff.

Tbh the problem is that the girl doesn’t choose for herself to go back or is actively taken back or talked to by the boyfriend. She clearly didn’t think much other than the pleasure the sex friend gave, and her feelings at guilt feel shallow for the ending, especially since it feels like the sister will still bang the sex friend sooner or later. Boyfriend-kun needs to get Gud at sex or break up with this bitch lol
it's stupid af
?????????????????????????????????? xD i hope this guy is not serious about this relationship right now, he'd be retarded if he is serious

Pussied out on a true ntr ending and left me with this nonsense. The most tilting thing an ntr can do is pussy out halfway through and try to make up some bs good ending that doesn't flow with the rest of the story. Also the bfs hairline is fucking scuffed. 1-10
She’s a cunt bro, she said she’d break up with you for his dick. Why would you take her back?
Man, i respect that mc retarded kindness, but i can't say this leave a satisfying end.

What the fuck this is trash, the girlfriend didn't even try to fight it but asked for it then get mad that the guy she cheating with is cheating on her and is FORGIVEN by her boyfriend. What absolute garbage is this?. hell its not even good from an NTR perspective
Fucking whore
From nrt to vanilla not bad
LOL people are mad XD
That's some fucking bullshit. You can't just pull a "Get Out of NTR Free" card like that. Makes no fucking sense.
im not a fan of ntr but this doujin is just a mess, im not even mad because of the cheating im mad because of that ending >.> just terrible
If there is a next chapter, im sure this thot will fukk classmates or whatnot
This needs some down rate
.....begone thot
Superb need sequel
kontolllll
Of course she is a bitch.
...haha wtf?! She got a free pass on cheating? BIH
I can only laugh at this lol, shitty NTR indeed. This author won't fit with NTR, try harder
I cried.....
As far as I know the mangaka stopped writing hentai after writing this
omg i actually threw up a bit
@Troncol Both of them are bitches hahaha it was only till the GF knew she wasn't the only one that she broke up with the guy
@dega230989  Actually it is NTR but author decided to break up the NTR route  with a stupid twist and a forced happy? ending
It's funny to see people censor the word fuck in a hentai site

I'm mad. Not because it's NTR, but i'm mad because that ending was the most retarded shit i've ever seen. NTR is supposed to invoke anger from the emotions of the story, not because the story itself is fucking stupid.

The sister didn't have a conscience, she's actually an even bigger slut. She only exposed him because he wasn't f*cking her. If he kept f*cking her too, she would've been fine with letting her own brother be a cuck forever (it is your own brother/fmily... Yeezus!)... she's a selfish brat, she defied Jungo because he wasn't banging her, period. Don’t get me started on the Heroine… I don't get her. She was so upset at the end upon hearing that he was f*cking her BF's sister and other girls. She was freaking cheating on her boyfriend like a piece of trash and even became a sex friend, and just 10 seconds before said she was gonna break up. *Sigh* Yuuta lost the most: he can't really trust his sister, his first love was pure and now is a lying corrupted ho, and he has no male acquaintance to rely on. He did nothing because he just didn't know(?), he's a sportsman, I doubt he wouldn't be able to rearrange Jungo's face. Why you took her back?! *Facepalm*
this is plain cheating not NTR.. but damn,, she got mad over the ntr boy for cheating when shes cheating from the victim guy? and now he let her get away with it.. boy... bbuuuurrnnnnnn hheerrr!!!!

Most NTR stories have a stupid af plot, but what the hell was this? Jesus Christ, I dont even know if the author tried to pull a happy ending or if he just wanted to piss people off.  Fucking hell, all I could say during the duration of this entire trainwreck is that the girls a fucking slut and then that ending hits u like a fucking rock. She did certainly not deserve a happy ending, like fucking hell, the boyfriend never even smashed.

That's something you don't see in NTR usually though. Even though she was willing to break up with her boyfriend, she actually felt remorse about it. She was still a stupid fucking cunt and the boyfriend deserved better, but still.
The translation seems to  get really bad in the last couple of pages as half of the things they said didnt make any sense and yeah the story is really stupid
This is so stupid
You know you are not good at netorare when your story makes people laugh LUL

This is the type of trash that makes NTR look bad...the art was good, but the story is one of the worst I've ever seen...the main girl is trash...the guy f*cking her was stupid (could've easily blackmailed her)...then she only gets upset at the guy because he had more sexfriends. The dumb girl is really the only who has some type of happy ending here and it's done poorly at that...this is the type of trash that puts me off when it comes to NTR.

I actually like the art from this manga, but the story is fucking stupid. She is willingly cheating on her boyfriend, not even trying to get anywhere with him anymore in favor of fucking her childhood friend, but gets upset when she learns that said cheating partner had other sex friends and has the audacity to slap him for it? What fucking moral high ground is that bitch standing on? Big sis should have told her brother what was happening so they're on the same level and if he wants to make things work with her then so be it, but leaving him out of the loop doesn't do anything good for him. This is only a happy ending for her, getting to cheat on her boyfriend for what seems like months and totally get away with it. That look of pure dread she had on her face when her boyfriends sister barged in though was satisfying. Shame he wasn't the one who barged in though.
That was a dumb ending. It is like half happy end and bad ending combined.
Ending was meh.
She was obviously cheating, but she didn't get NTRd away.
Seriously...NTR's artist've some kind of stupid plot in all their stories
